properties.Name: RelatedFinancialStatement
properties.Description: The relationship between two or more Financial Statements.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: RelatedLegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: RelatedFinancialStatementId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Financial Statement.

Columns.Name: RelatedPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: RelatedPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the financial statement is prepared.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementRelationshipTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Ledger Relationship Type.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementRelationshipNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the financial statement relationship.
